# lineJoin

**Instance Property**

The junction type used when the stroked portion of the shape node is rendered.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var lineJoin: CGLineJoin { get set }
```

```swift
var lineJoin: CGLineJoin { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGLineJoin/bevel]. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGLineJoin].

## Stroking a Shape

- **lineWidth**: The width used to stroke the path.
- **strokeColor**: The color used to stroke the shape.
- **strokeTexture**: The texture used to stroke the shape.
- **glowWidth**: A glow that extends outward from the stroked line.
- **lineCap**: The style used to render the endpoints of the stroked portion of the shape node.
- **miterLimit**: The miter limit to use when the line is stroked using a miter join style.
- **isAntialiased**: A Boolean value that determines whether the stroked path is smoothed when drawn.
